1.name: First level
1.message: Cat moves into boxes right next to it! Click on an empty tile to place a box!

2.name: Second level
2.message: Your goal is to get all cats inside boxes!

3.name: New cat appears
3.message: Not all cats are the same. Cooler cats can move to boxes that are two tiles from them!

4.name: Boxes have limits
4.message: Only one cat can fit into a box. Multiple cats trying to get inside at the same time will break the box!

5.name: Sacrificial box
5.message: Sometimes you need to break a box to get all cats inside boxes.

6.name: Confused by choices
6.message: Cats can't pick between multiple available boxes, making them unable to act.

7.name: Chain reaction
7.message: A single box can cause large movements.

8.name: Cutting corners
8.message: Ninja cat moves diagonally. Being surrounded on all four directions is no challenge!

9.name: Surrounded
9.message: Center has cats aplenty. Spread out!
